DOC.brief_title: Comparison Ascorbic Acid Grape Seed Extract Oxidative Stress Induced Pump Heart Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim compare effect grape seed extract ascorbic acid oxidative stress induce pump coronary artery pas graft surgery . There three group study . 75 candidate coronary artery pas graft surgery assign random allocation group ( 25 group ) . 1 . Control 2 . GSE ( 100 mg/6h - PO , 24h surgery ) 3 . Vit C ( 25 mg/kg pump circulation surgery )
DOC.criteria: Candidates elective CABG surgery pump first time 3VD High risk patient Those need another heart surgery beside CABG Urgent patient Diabetics Ischemic time 120 min
